sn17.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn17.1:2.1: “Daruno, bhikkhave, labhasakkarasiloko katuko pharuso antarayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
sn17.1:2.3: ‘uppannam labhasakkarasilokam pajahissama, na ca no uppanno labhasakkarasiloko cittam pariyadaya thassati’ti.
